content: Hey Heidi. Thank you for writing this article. I actually started writing to hone in on my craft and my purpose as a designer. My writing became weekly between writing for myself and writing for the agency I was working with. I finally stepped up and started writing for my own design newsletter. Each has been a new experiment on shaping my writing ability to add value to people. I feel like I’m starting to taste a few of the things you talked about here so thank you. It’s more of the validation I needed as well that I’m on the right track. I appreciate it 👍
